extendedInfo.description: Get Breaking News, Weather and Sports information for Nebraska and Iowa wherever you are with the KMTV Action 3 News app. The KMTV app offers extensive coverage of the stories that matter most from Action 3 News in Omaha. From Daybreak with Deanne Brink and Matt Monroe, to Live at 10 p.m. with Craig Nigrelli and Jennifer Griswold, Chief Meteorologist Ryan McPike and Sports Director Chase Williams, our app provides you Nebraskaâs News throughout the day powered by kmtv.com. App features include: -The latest weather forecast from your Weather Alert Team from Chief Meteorologist Ryan McPike, Matt Monroe, and John Walsh -Sports information on your favorite teams, including the Nebraska Cornhuskers, Creighton Bluejays and Your Favorite Local High School Teams - iContribute photos and videos -News, Weather and Sports photos -Videos from our latest Newscasts -School and Business closings -Contests and Promotions -An easy way to listen to our radio stations, AM590 ESPN KXSP, Channel 94.1 KQCH, CD105.9 KKCD, Star 104.5 KSRZ, Z-92 KEZO and the Todd-N-Tyler Radio Empire TNT -A way to submit your story or photo to our station via iContribute Plus, you can easily share this content and connect to your friends and family using the Facebook feature on our app!

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Excellent navigation and appeal.  Not 5 star because it sometimes does not understand my current network connection.
reviews.author: Matt Brown

reviews.comment: Its never up to date
reviews.author: ROCHELLE BOWENS

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this app
reviews.author: Autumn Achenbach

reviews.title: This App is Sweet
reviews.comment: I like the app but only have it because my brother works for KMTV  Rock On!!  \\m/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super Handy for Traffic Updates
reviews.comment: User friendly and informative.  What more can I ask?  :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: i really like this app.
reviews.comment: great app! i reference this app several times a day for my news updates. always informative stories, not the f fluff you get from some stories on other local news apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: The stories are short, without any details. There are no videos. The stories are somewhat old and not updated adequately. The app is just as bad as the newscast.
reviews.author: E. Fernandez

reviews.title: Meow
reviews.comment: I catch the show 2 or more times a week.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Opening issue
reviews.comment: Have issues with it not always wanting to open up.
reviews.author: Jodie Vardaman

reviews.title: Not up to date
reviews.comment: They need to have the latest and greatest

reviews.comment: Works great this is way better than the ketv app.

reviews.title: Weather
reviews.comment: There is no weather. Would be nice to be able to view the 3d viper radar. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame App.
reviews.comment: There is no video for anything. Not even in the \"Video\" section. Really?! The lack of weather is unacceptable but the biggest let down has to be the inability to watch the news as one is lead to believe. Uninstalling! Fire your Dev team.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Old news
reviews.comment: The stories are very rarely updated. Today is Monday and half the news stories are from last Friday.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kmtv-TV
reviews.comment: No weather app.  Disappointed and uninstalling!!!

reviews.title: YO! WHERE IS THE WEATHER!!
reviews.comment: This blows!!! No weather except for current temp. Navigations isn\'t worth a crap. Half the stuff in this app isn\'t even there or doesn\'t work! CAN YOU SAY UNINSTALL!!!
